Text:
Post your porn in the porn section only.

We shouldn't have to move all your titles for you.

I am new to this and still learning. But what I do know is that we all make mistakes as a part of the learning process.  It was not my intent to cause a problem. I think that my posting demonstrates that I am trying. 

It would have been more productive and helpful to have provided me with a link to learn how to correct my mistake. 

I need to ask, do you think you were treating me in a manner that you would like to be treated?
